mapper.sql: PSID, PID, Stock, PType, Price, Remark, SaleDate, Status, Stay1, Stay2, Sn
mapper.select:
select
from Pro_ProductSale where PSID = #{psid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sn ASC

select s.*,p.ProductName ProductName,m.dictname SortName,b.dictname BrandName,f.dictname SeriesName FROM Pro_ProductSale s LEFT JOIN Pro_Product p ON s.PID = p.PID LEFT JOIN pro_dict m ON m.DID = p.SortID LEFT JOIN pro_dict b ON b.DID = p.BrandID LEFT JOIN pro_dict f ON f.DID = p.SeriesID WHERE 1=1
AND s.PSID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{psid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND s.PID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND p.ProductName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND m.DictName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{sortname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
And b.DictName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
And f.Dictname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{seriesname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
And s.ModelName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{modelname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
And s.PType LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{ptype, jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
AND m.DID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{sortid, jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
AND f.DID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{seriesid, jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
AND b.DID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandid, jdbcType=INTEGER}),'%')
order by s.SaleDate desc,s.sn ASC

select count(*) from Pro_ProductSale a where 1=1
AND a.PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into Pro_ProductSale (PSID, PID, Stock, PType, Price, Remark, SaleDate, Status, Stay1, Stay2, Sn) values (#{psid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saledate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into Pro_ProductSale
PSID,
PID,
Stock,
PType,
Price,
Remark,
SaleDate,
Status,
Stay1,
Stay2,
Sn,
#{psid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{saledate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update Pro_ProductSale
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PType = #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SaleDate = #{saledate,jdbcType=DATE},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Stay1 = #{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Stay2 = #{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PSID = #{psid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Pro_ProductSale set PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PType = #{ptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SaleDate = #{saledate,jdbcType=DATE}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Stay1 = #{stay1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Stay2 = #{stay2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PSID = #{psid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
